verbose_text: Immune checkpoint inhibitors such as Ipilimumab, the CTLA-4 antibody, and Nivolumab, an anti-PD-1 antibody, have been increasingly used in cancers such as metastatic melanoma and renal cell carcinoma but have been associated with several IMAE, including a high incidence of diarrhea and colitis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: inhibitors such as Ipilimumab, the CTLA-4 antibody, and Nivolumab, an anti-PD-1 antibody
